pullRequest.title: CLDR-14122 Bulk close some open forum posts
pullRequest.bodyText:
-New Bulk Close Posts command in gear menu, for Admin only
-New SurveyBulkClosePosts.java
-New CldrStBulkClosePosts.js, special/bulk_close_posts.js
-Move equalsOrInheritsCurrentValue to XMLSource.java
-New method SurveyForum.closeThreads, use also for PostType.CLOSE
-New TestCldrStBulkClosePosts.js, bulk_close_posts_json.js

Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-14122
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

commit.message:
CLDR-14122 Bulk close some open forum posts

-New Bulk Close Posts command in gear menu, for Admin only

-New SurveyBulkClosePosts.java

-New CldrStBulkClosePosts.js, special/bulk_close_posts.js

-Move equalsOrInheritsCurrentValue to XMLSource.java

-New method SurveyForum.closeThreads, use also for PostType.CLOSE

-New TestCldrStBulkClosePosts.js, bulk_close_posts_json.js

nodes.bodyText: this is so close to being a REST API… in my mind I can almost see the @-annotations on each function!
